title: Miniature Portrait of a Young Girl
provenance_text:
Georginia Mary Smith [-1908], until 1908 [1]; by descent to Helena Day Snyder, her daughter, Brooklyn, NY, until April 19, 1918 [2]; purchased by Herbert DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, April 19, 1918; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927. 
NOTES: [1] Georginia Mary Smith, later Georgina Mary Day, was the niece of the sitter, who is traditionally identified as Cordelia Smith. [2] Helena Day Snyder was the grandniece of the sitter.
